function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased pollen exposure due to urban green space","Impact":"Exacerbation of allergic respiratory response (pollinosis)","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of pollen levels, selection of low-pollen plant species, and public health education","Technologies":"Pollen monitoring stations, weather prediction models, and air pollution control technologies","People":"Citizens allergic to pollen","Owner":"City planners and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Rising prevalence and severity of pollinosis","Impact":"Increased public health burden and impaired work fitness","Mitigation":"Investment in allergy research, development of allergy treatments, and public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Biomedical research technologies, allergy medication, and public health communication tools","People":"City populations and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health authorities and research institutions"},{"Description":"Impact of climate change and air pollution on pollinosis exposure","Impact":"Increased pollinosis risk due to climate change and air pollution enforcement","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict air pollution regulations, investments in climate change mitigation, and public awareness on the link between climate change, air pollution, and pollinosis","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring devices, renewable energy technologies, and climate change adaptation tools","People":"City populations and environmental advocacy groups","Owner":"Government authorities and environmental organizations"}]}
